name: UInterchangeSceneNode
doc:
The scene node represents a transform node in the scene.
Scene nodes can have user-defined attributes. Use UInterchangeUserDefinedAttributesAPI to get and set user-defined attribute data.

methods.name: GetCustomAnimationAssetUidToPlay
methods.doc: Get the Animation Asset To Play by this Scene Node.

methods.name: GetCustomAssetInstanceUid
methods.doc: Get which asset, if any, a scene node is instantiating. Return false if the Attribute was not set previously.

methods.name: GetCustomBindPoseGlobalTransform
methods.doc: Get the global transform of the bind pose scene node. This value is computed from the local transforms of all parent bind poses.

methods.name: GetCustomBindPoseLocalTransform
methods.doc: Get the local transform of the bind pose scene node.

methods.name: GetCustomGeometricTransform
methods.doc: Get the geometric offset. Any mesh attached to this scene node will be offset using this transform.

methods.name: GetCustomGlobalTransform
methods.doc: Get the default scene node global transform. This value is computed from the local transforms of all parent scene nodes.

methods.name: GetCustomLocalTransform
methods.doc:
Get the default scene node local transform.
The default transform is the local transform of the node (no bind pose, no time evaluation).

methods.name: GetCustomTimeZeroGlobalTransform
methods.doc: Get the global transform of the time-zero scene node. This value is computed from the local transforms of all parent time-zero scene nodes.

methods.name: GetCustomTimeZeroLocalTransform
methods.doc: Get the local transform of the time-zero scene node.

methods.name: GetMorphTargetCurveWeights
methods.doc: Get MorphTargets and their weights.

methods.name: GetSlotMaterialDependencies
methods.doc: Retrieve the correspondence table between slot names and assigned materials for this object.

methods.name: GetSlotMaterialDependencyUid
methods.doc: Retrieve the Material dependency for a given slot of this object.

methods.name: GetSpecializedTypeCount
methods.doc: Get the specialized type this scene node represents (for example, Joint or LODGroup).

methods.name: RemoveSlotMaterialDependencyUid
methods.doc: Remove the Material dependency associated with the given slot name from this object.

methods.name: SetCustomAnimationAssetUidToPlay
methods.doc: Set the Animation Asset To Play by this Scene Node. Only relevant for SkeletalMeshActors (that is, SceneNodes that are instantiating Skeletal Meshes).

methods.name: SetCustomAssetInstanceUid
methods.doc: Add an asset for this scene node to instantiate.

methods.name: SetCustomBindPoseLocalTransform
methods.doc: Set the local transform of the bind pose scene node.

methods.name: SetCustomGeometricTransform
methods.doc: Set the geometric offset. Any mesh attached to this scene node will be offset using this transform.

methods.name: SetCustomLocalTransform
methods.doc:
Set the default scene node local transform.
The default transform is the local transform of the node (no bind pose, no time evaluation).

methods.name: SetCustomTimeZeroLocalTransform
methods.doc: Set the local transform of the time-zero scene node.

methods.name: SetMorphTargetCurveWeight
methods.doc: Set MorphTarget with given weight.

methods.name: SetSlotMaterialDependencyUid
methods.doc: Add the specified Material dependency to a specific slot name of this object.
